Online
Inquiry


Business

This visa is for people who want to own and manage a new or existing business in Australia, or to invest in an Australian state or territory.​​

More Information

Family

For fiancés, partners, children and parents of Australian citizens, Australian permanent residents or eligible New Zealand citizens.

More Information

Student

Student visas are temporary visas that allow people to come to Australia for a specified period to study at an Australian educational institution.

More Information

Visitor

For people visiting Australia for holidays, tourism, recreation or to see family and friends.

More Information
